title: Parler Back Girl, Con Artists Capture The Zeitgeist 3.1.21
itunes:title: Parler Back Girl, Con Artists Capture The Zeitgeist 3.1.21
description:
In episode 821, Jack and Miles are joined by There Are No Girls On The Internet's Bridget Todd to discuss the Covid-19 relief bill, CPAC, what's going on with Parler, Criminal Minds, reactions to I Care A lot, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. Biden’s COVID relief bill widely popular among swing voters, Democratic poll finds
  2. CPAC’s Golden Trump Statue Highlights GOP’s Literal Idolization Of Ex-POTUS
  3. What’s Going On With Parler?
  4. ‘We Will Not Be Canceled’: Parler Relaunches After Month Offline In Wake Of Capitol Attack
  5. Parler crawls back online empty and with a Tea Party CEO
  6. After Weeks Of Being Offline, Parler Finds A New Web Host
  7. Parler Resurfaces Online, Vows Not To Be A 'Tool For Crime'
  8. 'Criminal Minds' Ascends to Top of Nielsen Streaming List
  9. The Reactions to Netflix's I Care a Lot Are Both Horrified and Kinda Thirsty
  10. WATCH: Kelela - Rewind (Sporting Life Remix)

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
